page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN UTTOXETER CONT
page.content: SHELL OIL DISTRIBUTORS: 51M, IF RETAIL CHAIN STORES : 42M, 65F TRENT VALLEY AGRIC. SUPPLIES: 13M, 6F BANKS: 19M , 33F BAGSHAWS-AUCTIONEERS,EST-AGENTS 50M,26F LAUNDRY: 23M , 96F FIRE STATION,POLICE:48M ,2M THOMAS ALLEYNE'S SCHOOL:56M, 75F CAR SHOW ROOMS:55M , 19F WHITE HART HOTEL: 7M,32F POST OFFICE: 25M , 8F BUILD. SOCIETIES :10M, 17F COUNCIL OFFICES: 8M , 6F UNEMPLOYMENT There have been 2 large scale company closures in the last 5 years which have increased the unemployment rate in the town. Bamfords Farm Machinery-reduced from 360 - 70 .
